name: Squirrel (todorrobot)
description:
SQUIRREL: A game made in three hours for THREE game jams.

The Friday Night Game Jam:
https://itch.io/jam/friday-night-game-jam-2020-4
Requirements: Built in three hours. Theme: TREES

Mix & Game Jam: 
https://itch.io/jam/mix-and-game-jam-2020
Requirements: Theme: Mix 2 Game Genres. (RETRO and INFINITE RUNNER)

Mini Jam 67:
https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-67-void
Requirements: No enemies. Theme: Void

Built on Flowlab.io by todorrobot. Music by baconcat008
